componentDescription: Renders a tabular display for presenting structured data with customizable styles.

data.description: An array of data objects to be displayed in the table rows.

columns.description: An array defining the table columns, including title and data field.

footer.description: An optional array of footer cells to display at the bottom of the table.

caption.description: An optional caption for the table, providing a brief title or explanation.

views.typeValues: { table?: ViewProps; thead?: ViewProps; tfoot?: ViewProps; tbody?: ViewProps; tr?: ViewProps; td?: ViewProps; th?: ViewProps; caption?: ViewProps; }
views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the table structure, overriding default styles.

themeMode.description: The theme mode (e.g., light or dark) to apply to the component, inherited from 'app-studio' ViewProps.
